account."},"allowance(address,address)":{"details":"Returns the allowance for a spender","params":{"owner":"The address of the owner of the tokens.","spender":"The address of the spender."},"returns":{"_0":"Number of tokens the spender is allowed to spend."}},"approve_withCaller(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Approves a spender [ERC20]. This removes the burned tokens from circulation.","params":{"amount":"Number of tokens to burn.","caller":"Address of the caller passed through the frontend.","from":"Address of the token owner.","h":"Hash which the token owner signed.","r":"Signature component.","s":"Sigature component.","v":"Signature component."}},"claimOwnership()":{"details":"Allows the pendingOwner address to finalize the transfer."},"claimStorageOwnership()":{"details":"Claims the ownership of the storage."},"constructor":{"details":"Contract constructor.","params":{"frontend_":"Address of the authorized frontend.","storage_":"Address of the token storage for the controller.","ticker_":"3 letter currency ticker.","validator":"Address of validator."}},"getFrontend()":{"details":"Returns the current frontend.","returns":{"_0":"Address of the frontend."}},"getStorage()":{"details":"Returns the current storage.","returns":{"_0":"Address of the storage."}},"getValidator()":{"details":"Gets the current validator.","returns":{"_0":"Address of validator."}},"isFrontend(address)":{"details":"Checks wether an address is a frontend.","params":{"frontend_":"Address of the frontend candidate."}},"isSystemAccount(address)":{"details":"Checks whether an address is a system account.","params":{"account":"the address to check."},"returns":{"_0":"true if system account."}},"mintTo_withCaller(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Mints new tokens.","params":{"amount":"Number of tokens to mint.","caller":"Address of the caller passed through the frontend.","to":"Address to credit the tokens."}},"pause()":{"details":"Pause the function protected by Pausable modifier."},"paused()":{"details":"Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise."},"recover_withCaller(address,address,address,bytes32,uint8,bytes32,bytes32)":{"details":"Recovers tokens from an address and reissues them to another address. In case a user loses its private key the tokens can be recovered by burning the tokens from that address and reissuing to a new address. To recover tokens the contract owner needs to provide a signature proving that the token owner has authorized the owner to do so.","params":{"caller":"Address of the caller passed through the frontend.","from":"Address to burn tokens from.","h":"Hash which the token owner signed.","r":"Signature component.","s":"Sigature component.","to":"Address to mint tokens to.","v":"Signature component."},"returns":{"_0":"Amount recovered."}},"removeSystemAccount(address)":{"details":"Removes the system role from an account."},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract."},"setBridgeFrontend(address,string)":{"details":"Set a new bridge frontend.","params":{"frontend_":"Address of the new bridge frontend.","title":"Keccack256 hash of the frontend title."}},"setFrontend(address)":{"details":"Sets a new frontend.","params":{"frontend_":"Address of the new frontend."}},"setStorage(address)":{"details":"Sets a new storage.","params":{"storage_":"Address of the new storage."}},"setValidator(address)":{"details":"Sets a new validator.","params":{"validator":"Address of validator."}},"totalSupply()":{"details":"Returns the total supply.","returns":{"_0":"Number of tokens."}},"transferAndCall_withCaller(address,address,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Transfers tokens and subsequently calls a method on the recipient [ERC677]. If the recipient is a non-contract address this method behaves just like transfer. The caller, to address and amount are validated before executing method.","params":{"amount":"Number of tokens to transfer.","caller":"Address of the caller passed through the frontend.","data":"Additional data passed to the recipient's tokenFallback method.","to":"Recipient address."}},"transferFrom_withCaller(address,address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Transfers tokens from a specific address [ERC20]. The address owner has to approve the spender beforehand. The caller, to address and amount are validated before executing method. Prior to transfering tokens the validator needs to approve.","params":{"amount":"Number of tokens to transfer.","caller":"Address of the caller passed through the frontend.","to":"Recipient address."}},"unpause()":{"details":"Unpause the function protected by Pausable modifier."}},"title":"SmartController","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"renounceOwnership()":{"notice":"Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. devdoc.details: This contract adds "smart" functionality which is required from a regulatory perspective.

addSystemAccount(address).details: Assigns the system role to an account.

allowance(address,address).details: Returns the allowance for a spender

params.owner: The address of the owner of the tokens.

returns._0: Number of tokens the spender is allowed to spend.

approve_withCaller(address,address,uint2.details: Approves a spender [ERC20]. Note that using the approve/transferFrom presents a possible security vulnerability described in: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1YLPtQxZu1UAvO9cZ1O2RPXBbT0mooh4DYKjA_jp-RLM/edit#heading=h.quou09mcbpzw Use transferAndCall to mitigate.

params.caller: Address of the caller passed through the frontend.
params.spender: The address of the future spender.

balanceOf(address).details: Returns the number tokens associated with an address.

burnFrom(address,uint256).details: Burns tokens from token owner. This removes the burned tokens from circulation.

burnFrom_withCaller(address,address,uint.details: Burns tokens from token owner. This removes the burned tokens from circulation.

params.caller: Address of the caller passed through the frontend.
params.h: Hash which the token owner signed.

claimOwnership().details: Allows the pendingOwner address to finalize the transfer.

claimStorageOwnership().details: Claims the ownership of the storage.

params.storage_: Address of the token storage for the controller.

isFrontend(address).details: Checks wether an address is a frontend.

isSystemAccount(address).details: Checks whether an address is a system account.

params.caller: Address of the caller passed through the frontend.

pause().details: Pause the function protected by Pausable modifier.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

recover_withCaller(address,address,addre.details: Recovers tokens from an address and reissues them to another address. In case a user loses its private key the tokens can be recovered by burning the tokens from that address and reissuing to a new address. To recover tokens the contract owner needs to provide a signature proving that the token owner has authorized the owner to do so.

params.caller: Address of the caller passed through the frontend.
params.h: Hash which the token owner signed.

removeSystemAccount(address).details: Removes the system role from an account.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

params.frontend_: Address of the new bridge frontend.
params.title: Keccack256 hash of the frontend title.

transferAndCall_withCaller(address,addre.details: Transfers tokens and subsequently calls a method on the recipient [ERC677]. If the recipient is a non-contract address this method behaves just like transfer. The caller, to address and amount are validated before executing method.

params.caller: Address of the caller passed through the frontend.
params.data: Additional data passed to the recipient's tokenFallback method.

transferFrom_withCaller(address,address,.details: Transfers tokens from a specific address [ERC20]. The address owner has to approve the spender beforehand. The from address, to address and amount are validated before executing method.

params.caller: Address of the caller passed through the frontend.
params.from: Address to debet the tokens from.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to set the pendingOwner address.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

transferStorageOwnership(address).details: Transfers the ownership of the storage.

params.newOwner: Address of the new storage owner.

transfer_withCaller(address,address,uint.details: Transfers tokens [ERC20]. The caller, to address and amount are validated before executing method. Prior to transfering tokens the validator needs to approve.

params.caller: Address of the caller passed through the frontend.

unpause().details: Unpause the function protected by Pausable modifier.

devdoc.title: SmartController

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

transferFrom_withCaller(address,address,.notice: Overrides method in a parent. Prior to transfering tokens the validator needs to approve.
